"Tucano": "I'm glad the Regional Mag was alright."
"There are even more of them elsewhere within Retem. You should pay them a visit if you ever have a moment."
"The thought occurs, someone of your skill level should be plenty capable of clearing the Cocoons."
"The ARKS in Retem use them as a measure of their skill."
"So how about it, want to try taking them on?"
"Triumphing over all of them is no easy task. To the best of my knowledge, only a small few can claim that honor..."
"I think someone as talented as you might just be able to do it too. Get out there and show your stuff."
"Even warriors need a break now and then. Let me know if you ever do feel up to it."
"Hadi really knows how to pick them..."
"It's a huge relief knowing we have ARKS like you fighting with us. Keep up the good work."
"Recently, remnants of enemy forces in the Dome have shown numerous signs of activity..."
"Even though we've repelled Lenus Retem, we haven't quelled the entire DOLLS threat yet."
"Budding disasters need to be nipped as soon as possible. Would you lend us your strength once more?"
"Please join the mission to subjugate the DOLLS then. The other ARKS are already on their way to the Dome."
"Even warriors need a break now and then. Let me know if you ever do feel up to it."
"Incredible. You continue to amaze at every turn..."
"We ARKS of Retem won't falter either. Let us fight for a better future together."
